timeline.bodyText: This makes the BlockHeaderValidator mutable, and IMHO should not be done.  Note we have a builder that has the exact same method, so instead of mutating a produced BlockHeaderValidator we should hook into wherever the builder is being created.
timeline.author: shemnon

timeline.bodyText: This will require a tiny bit of replumbing.  We can have blockHeaderValidatorBuilder return the builder instead of the fully assembled blockHeaderValidator. Then we call addRule on the builder, then build and store.
